name: Fish n Friend'chips
description:
You have one minute to catch small fish before you are submerged in dark and gloomy. 

Help yourself with jellyfish...or not. The more you catch, the longer your light lasts. 

Isn't friendship beautiful?

Fish n Friend'Chips is a chill arcade game made during the One Minute Jam / Ludum Dare 50 edition. In this game, you control a shy old lantern fish who is looking for friends, in an atmosphere that is both fun and poetic.

Credits :

Camille Ollagnon - Hugo Delacour - Marie Abrino - Romain Seurot
